sentences.sContent: Surgeons removed a foot-long barb from his heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: Surgeons removed a foot-long barb from his heart.
sentences.sCn: 外科医生正从他的心脏移出一英尺长的倒钩。

words.tran: 有刺的；讽刺的；有倒钩的
讽刺（barb的过去分词）；装倒钩

trans.tranOther: the sharp curved point of a hook,  arrow  etc that prevents it from being easily pulled out
